src:
Michael Owen: Liverpool Takkan Pernah Mati
05 Nov 2019, 02:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Liverpool menjadi kandidat terkuat peraih gelar juara Premier League musim ini. Dan jika hal tersebut menjadi nyata, maka laga kontra Aston Villa bakalan terkenang di benak publik.
Pertemuan antara Liverpool dengan Aston Villa terjadi dalam pekan ke-11 Premier League hari Sabtu (2/11/2019) lalu. Bermain di Villa Park, tim besutan Jurgen Klopp tersebut menang dengan skor tipis 2-1.
Publik sempat mengira bahwa Liverpool akan merasakan kekalahan perdananya di ajang Premier League musim ini. Bagaimana tidak, mereka sempat tertinggal 0-1 hingga menjelang berakhirnya pertandingan.
Namun semuanya berubah begitu Andrew Robertson mencetak gol pada menit ke-87. Kemudian, Sadio Mane menambahkan keunggulan Liverpool beberapa saat sebelum wasit meniupkan peluit panjang. The Reds pun keluar sebagai pemenang dengan cara yang dramatis.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Michael Owen: Liverpool will never die
05 Nov 2019, 02:00 by Bola.net
Liverpool - Liverpool are the strongest candidates for the Premier League title winners this season. And if it becomes real, then the match against Aston Villa will be remembered in the minds of the public.
The meeting between Liverpool and Aston Villa took place in the 11th week of the Premier League last Saturday (11/02/2019). Playing at Villa Park, Jurgen Klopp's team won by a narrow score of 2-1.
The public had thought that Liverpool would feel its inaugural defeat at the Premier League this season. How not, they had left behind 0-1 until the end of the match.
But everything changed as Andrew Robertson scored in the 87th minute. Then, Sadio Mane added Liverpool's advantage moments before the referee blew the long whistle. The Reds came out victorious in a dramatic way.

Scroll down to read full information.
